mapper.select: select distinct t2.id, t2.resources_name as resourcesName, t2.resources_url as resourcesUrl, t2.menu_id as menuId, t2.creator, t2.create_time as createTime, t2.`status` from tb_sys_permission_resources t1,tb_sys_resources t2 where t1.resources_id = t2.id and t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and t1.permission_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select DISTINCT t.id, t.resources_name as resourcesName from tb_sys_resources t left join (select t1.id from tb_sys_resources t1,tb_sys_permission_resources t2 where t1.id = t2.resources_id and t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and t2.permission_id = #{permissionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) tt on t.id = tt.id where t.`status` = '1' and tt.id is null
and t.resources_name like CONCAT('%', #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
